metadata.text2:
If duct dependent heart disease suspected try not to over oxygenate
Discuss with physician
metadata.text3:
Use naso/Oro gastric feeding to reduce WOB


Refer for echocardiogram 
- Try to get a CXR and Echo locally 
- Send FBC, Group and cross match
- Assess for signs of heart failure - consider diuretics 
- Refer to paediatric cardiologist in tertiary centre if possible
